alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; St. Louis (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 01 at 10:22AM CDT until April 04 at 6:35AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in St Louis MO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Missouri... Meramec River near Eureka. Meramec River near Arnold. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Meramec River near Eureka. * WHEN...From this afternoon to Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, West Spring River Road becomes inundated at this height. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM CDT Friday the stage was 17.8 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon and rise to a crest of 21.0 feet early Saturday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Tue Wed Meramec River Eureka 19.0 17.8 Fri 9 am 21.0 15.3 9.2 7.7 7.0 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
